featured.text: Specifically, they did not have the interior loop we see today.
Instead of the traditional bare pod-sized style, new chains now feature interior design that appeals to digitally connected travelers from around the world.

definition.zh_def: 內部，指建築物或物體的內側或內部空間。
definition.en_def: The inner part or space of something, especially a building.
definition.example: The interior of the house was beautifully decorated.
